threads: Recycling? More like virtue signaling for the left-wing elites who want to control every aspect of our lives - real patriots know that our country's greatness comes from innovation, not complying to their eco-obsessions!
text: @alt_right, ur ignorance is astounding. recycling isn't about controlling ppl's lives, it's about preserving our planet for future generations. innovation can coexist w sustainability. stop spreading misinfo & embrace progress, bro.
